snippet: Chicago defeated Minnesota, 4-3, to complete a sweep of Minnesota, and Montreal beat Tampa Bay, 6-2, to stave off elimination in their second-round playoff series.
abstract: Montreal Canadiens defeat Tampa Bay Lightning, 6-2; Lightning leads second-round playoff series, 3-1.
lead_paragraph: Chicago defeated Minnesota, 4-3, to complete a sweep of Minnesota, and Montreal beat Tampa Bay, 6-2, to stave off elimination in their second-round playoff series.

headline.main: Blackhawks Advance to Western Conference Finals With Sweep
headline.print_headline: Canadiens Avoid Exit With a Rout
